About Us

Horizon Stones has a share in many quarries which give us the advantage to maintain high quality products , our supplying capacity is 15,000 mᶾ of Blocks and 600,000 m² of Slabs and tiles ,

Horizon Stones Provides a large choices of Egyptian and imported Marble and Granite, Our products can be delivered in various shapes of (Blocks , Slabs and Tiles) , Slaps and tiles also are delivered in various sizes and thinness , Different finishing are available (Unpolished, Polished , Sandblasted , Honed , Acid Treated , Brushed , Split face , Nailed ,Tumbled and Bush-Hammered) , our office is based in front of the marble industrial Zone ( Shaq-Elthoban ) near to our factory , your visits to our factory are welcomed.

Also we are providing a High quality service of supply and installation ( Normal Installation , Mechanical Installation ).

Our Mission

The expertise Team of Horizon Stones grantees to provide the high service quality with competitive prices for our clients giving them the leadership among their competitors , Horizon Stones believes that it works hand in hand with their clients so we are providing after delivery services to make sure our clients’ Satisfactions.

Our Vision

Aiming to be a leading company in marble and granite field worldwide, taking in consideration the large facilities and connections that Horizon stones has in Egyptian , European and middle eastern markets , Targeting new markets like USA , Australia and Brazil .

Advantage of Egyptian Marble .

  • The competitive price of Egyptian marble makes it the best choice for our customer specially when it is provided with high quality .
  • The various Types of material and colors of Egyptian marble help our customer choice.

Advantage of granite

The very low porosity of granite rocks gives its surface many advantage

  • Long lasting specially in the places which exposed to water for long time .
  • Extremely solid nothing is more solid except diamond .
  • High Resistant to heat .
  • High Resistant of weather condition
  • Easy to be cleaned because the non-porous surface prevent dust and water to penetrate.
